name: Lindwurm
description: The Lindwurm is a large dragon with incredible dexterity, thriving in icy terrains and possessing a tough physique to withstand attacks.
memorable: Its biting attack can inflict a disease, potentially leading to exhaustion, making it uniquely dangerous in combat.
goals: The Lindwurm typically seeks to dominate its icy surroundings and will attack adventurers that intrude on its territory.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other dragons or cold-themed creatures.
environment: Usually found in snowy or icy regions.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, agile movement across ice, and disease-inflicting bite.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to fire damage and low intelligence affecting combat strategy.
attacks: The Lindwurm can make multiple attacks including a disease-inflicting bite, slashing claw attacks, and constricting grapples.
most_powerful_ability: Its bite can cause disease, leading to possible exhaustion and complications if not treated.
senses: It has tremorsense up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect movement even through solid surfaces.
skills: It is proficient in Acrobatics and Stealth, enabling it to maneuver effectively in its icy habitat.
additional_information: Can ignore difficult terrain created by ice.
Gains advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone while on ice or snow.
Uses its environment to gain tactical advantages in combat.
Possesses high Dexterity, making it evasive.
Can grapple enemies with its Constrict attack.
test_queries: large dragon that dominates snowy terrain
formidable creature with icy attacks and vulnerabilities
monster immune to cold and vulnerable to fire
